mapper.select:
SELECT '0' AS CHK , '' AS ROWFLAG , A.SCR_ID , A.SCR_NO , A.SCR_NAME , A.SCR_TYPE_CD , A.PJT_ID , A.BIZ_ID , D.BIZ_NAME , A.IMPORTANT_CD , A.DIFFICULT_CD , A.PLAN_SDATE , A.PLAN_EDATE , A.ACTL_SDATE , A.ACTL_EDATE , A.CHG_USER_NM , A.DEV_USER_ID , A.DEV_USER_NM , A.DEV_USER_DEPT , A.PL_USER_ID , A.PL_USER_NM , A.PL_USER_DEPT , A.REG_STIME , A.REG_USER_ID , A.REG_USER_NM , A.REG_USER_DEPT , A.LMOD_SDATE , A.LMOD_USER_ID , A.LMOD_USER_NM , A.LMOD_USER_DEPT , A.SCR_DESC , A.REMARK , B.PJT_NAME AS PJT_NAME , C.PJT_ID AS P_PJT_ID , C.PJT_NAME AS P_PJT_NAME , E.FUNC_NO_INFO , E.FUNC_NAME_INFO
FROM PJ_SCREEN A , PJ_PROJECT B , PJ_PROJECT C , PJ_BIZ D , ( SELECT EE.PJT_ID , EE.SCR_ID , SUBSTR(XMLAGG(XMLELEMENT(X, '¶', FF.FUNC_NO) ORDER BY FF.FUNC_NO, FF.FUNC_ID).EXTRACT('//text()').GETCLOBVAL(),2) AS FUNC_NO_INFO , SUBSTR(XMLAGG(XMLELEMENT(X, '¶', FF.FUNC_NAME) ORDER BY FF.FUNC_NO, FF.FUNC_ID).EXTRACT('//text()').GETCLOBVAL(),2) AS FUNC_NAME_INFO FROM PJ_SCR_FUNC_MAP EE , PJ_FUNCTION FF
WHERE 1 = 1 AND EE.FUNC_ID = FF.FUNC_ID AND EE.PJT_ID = FF.PJT_ID AND EE.PJT_ID = #{SUB_PJT_ID}
GROUP BY EE.PJT_ID , EE.SCR_ID ) E
WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.PJT_ID = B.PJT_ID AND B.PARENT_ID = C.PJT_ID AND A.PJT_ID = D.PJT_ID AND A.BIZ_ID = D.BIZ_ID AND A.PJT_ID = E.PJT_ID(+) AND A.SCR_ID = E.SCR_ID(+) AND A.PJT_ID = #{SUB_PJT_ID}
AND A.BIZ_ID = #{BIZ_ID}
AND UPPER(A.SCR_NO) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{SCR_NO}) || '%'
AND UPPER(A.SCR_NAME) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{SCR_NM}) || '%'
AND A.SCR_TYPE_CD = #{SCR_TYPE_CD}
AND UPPER(A.CHG_USER_NM) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{CHG_USER_NM}) || '%'
AND UPPER(A.DEV_USER_NM) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{DEV_USER_NM}) || '%'
AND UPPER(A.PL_USER_NM) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{PL_USER_NM}) || '%'
AND A.SCR_ID IN ( SELECT AA.SCR_ID FROM PJ_SCR_FUNC_MAP AA , PJ_FUNCTION BB
WHERE 1 = 1 AND AA.PJT_ID = BB.PJT_ID AND AA.FUNC_ID = BB.FUNC_ID AND AA.PJT_ID = #{SUB_PJT_ID} AND UPPER(BB.FUNC_NO) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{FUNC_NO}) || '%' )
AND ( A.PLAN_SDATE BETWEEN #{SDATE} AND #{EDATE} OR A.PLAN_EDATE BETWEEN #{SDATE} AND #{EDATE} )
AND ( A.ACTL_SDATE BETWEEN #{SDATE} AND #{EDATE} OR A.ACTL_EDATE BETWEEN #{SDATE} AND #{EDATE} )
ORDER BY A.SCR_NO, A.SCR_ID
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM PJ_RPPR_SCR_MAP WHERE 1 = 1 AND SCR_ID = #{SCR_ID}
DELETE FROM PJ_STEST_SCR_MAP WHERE 1 = 1 AND SCR_ID = #{SCR_ID}
DELETE FROM PJ_SCR_FUNC_MAP WHERE 1 = 1 AND SCR_ID = #{SCR_ID}
DELETE FROM PJ_SCREEN WHERE 1 = 1 AND SCR_ID = #{SCR_ID}
